sk.tsystems.forum.services

Class CommentServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.services.CommentServices

  • public class CommentServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods needed for adding, removing and retrieving information about stored data of Comment class from the database.
    Author:
    martinharcarik

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentServices() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCommentToDatabase(Comment comment)
      Adds the instance of Comment class into database.
      Comment getComment(int commentID)
      Gets the instance of the Comment class from the database identified by the value of the property 'commentID'.
      java.util.List<Comment> printComments(int taskID)
      Gets the list of all instances of Comment class stored in the database for the specified instance of the Task class.
      void removeComment(int commentID)
      Removes the instance of the Comment class with specified property 'commentID' from database
      void updateComment(int commentID, java.lang.String newComment)
      Sets the property 'comment' of the specified instance of the Comment class and stores this instance into the database.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommentServices

        public CommentServices()

    • Method Detail

      • addCommentToDatabase

        public void addCommentToDatabase(Comment comment)
        Adds the instance of Comment class into database. Instance of Comment is sent as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        comment - is the instance of class Comment that needs to be stored in database.

      • printComments

        public java.util.List<Comment> printComments(int taskID)
        Gets the list of all instances of Comment class stored in the database for the specified instance of the Task class.
        Parameters:
        taskID - value of 'taskID' property of Task class needed to identify the instance of the Task class to get the list of instances of Comment class for
        Returns:
        list of all instances of the Comment class from database for specified instance of Task class

      • removeComment

        public void removeComment(int commentID)
        Removes the instance of the Comment class with specified property 'commentID' from database
        Parameters:
        commentID - is value of 'commentID' property of the Comment class. Needed to retrieve the specified instance of the Comment class.

      • getComment

        public Comment getComment(int commentID)
        Gets the instance of the Comment class from the database identified by the value of the property 'commentID'.
        Parameters:
        commentID - is value of 'commentID' property of the Comment class
        Returns:
        the instance of Comment class with specified value of it's property 'commentID' or null, if the specified instance is not present in the database

      • updateComment

        public void updateComment(int commentID,
                          java.lang.String newComment)
        Sets the property 'comment' of the specified instance of the Comment class and stores this instance into the database.
        Parameters:
        commentID - value of the property 'commentID' stored in the database, used to retrieve the instance of the Comment class from the database before updating it's properties
        newComment - new value of the property 'comment' of the Comment class to be stored in the database
